name: tpt_allow_deesc
description: allow any de-esc (Korn et al.) for 3+3

name: skip_esc
description: allow skipping doses while escalating

name: skip_deesc
description: allow skipping doses while de-escalating

name: no_esc_if_observed_gt_target
description: no dose escalation if the overall observed DLT rate at the current dose level is above the target DLT rate

name: n_doses
description: number of dose levels

name: ttl
description: target toxicity level

name: max_n
description: maximum sample size (always stop after n patients)

name: start_dose
description: starting dose level

name: prior_var
description: prior estimate of variance

name: stop_tox_x
description: p(true DLT rate at lowest dose > target DLT rate + x | data) > y

name: stop_tox_y
description: p(true DLT rate at lowest dose > target DLT rate + x | data) > y

name: stop_n_mtd
description: min number at recommended DLT before early stopping

name: current_seed
description: seed for re-producibility of simulations

name: n_sims
description: number of simulations

name: prior_ttp
description: string (comma-seperated) of prior estimate of ttp values

name: true_dlt_ss
description: string (comma-seperated) of true DLT rates

name: know_doses
description: does user know number of dose levels

name: know_ttl
description: does the user know the target toxicity level

name: need_tox_interval
description: does the user need a ttl interval

name: know_prior_tox_info
description: does the user have prior toxicity info

name: stats_help
description: does the user allow statistical help

name: know_late_tox
description: does the user know if they need to consider delayed toxicities

name: know_max_n
description: does the user know the maximum sample size

name: drug_type
description: type of investigational drug

name: cohort_size
description: size of each cohort (fixed, see cohort_vary)

name: cohort_vary
description: do the cohort sizes vary

name: prior_mtd
description: prior guess of the dose that is MTD, used to fit the skeleton
